document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad on thursday ordered the release of all detainees arrested in a wave of protests, except those who committed crimes "against the nation and the citizens," state media said.
document.title: syria's assad orders release of detainees: report
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad on thursday ordered the release of all detainees arrested in a wave of protests, except those who committed crimes "against the nation and the citizens," state media said.
